sentences.sContent: I was so comfortable and warm in bed I didn’t want to get up.
sentences.sCn: 床上又舒服又暖和，我都不想起来。

sentences.sContent: ...All the clothes are similar to the space suits designs that kept astronauts comfortable in the temperatures of the moon...
...mobile robots have been programmed to keep a comfortable distance from humans...
...means that even the better-off must work longer to have a comfortable retirement...
...the colored players had to stand around and drink out of paper cups while the white players and cheerleaders sat down in comfortable chairs and drank out of glasses...
...I’m not comfortable in any relationship where all I do is take...
...Supporters of higher education insist that education is the ticket to a steadier and better-paying job and the basis of a comfortable life...
...I always serve the freshest possible food and I make the atmosphere as comfortable and as pleasant as I can...
...Internet As consumers become more comfortable with online shopping...

words.tran: 不舒服的；无安慰的；不自由的
安慰者；圣灵；（美）被子；（英）羊毛围巾

trans.tranOther: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc
